# IDE Insert Text
<!--
@name: IDE Insert Text
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Insert a string at the position of the cursor
## Parameters

- **text&dollar;**: Text to insert
- **tags&dollar;**: Tags for future expansion
---
